title: NewVoiceMedia Selected as One of the World's Most Valuable Cloud Computing Companies by Insights Success Magazine
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 1:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: NewVoiceMedia 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/22/15 -- NewVoiceMedia , a leading global provider of cloud technology which helps businesses sell more, serve better and grow faster, today announced that it has been named as one of Insights Success Magazine's "20 Most Valuable Cloud Computing Companies", a highly selective honor given to companies at the global forefront of innovation in cloud computing. 
NewVoiceMedia was selected because its ContactWorld for Service and ContactWorld for Sales solutions are transforming the way organizations connect with their customers worldwide, enabling them to deliver a personalized and unique customer service experience and drive a more effective sales and marketing team. 
"The ContactWorld products are absolute game changers for any business," said Sonal Burghate, Managing Editor of Insights Success. "NewVoiceMedia's integrated, omni-channel approach radically increases efficiency so companies can offer a higher quality customer experience. The company's cloud platform is completely flexible and scalable and is already handling millions of calls for thousands of reps all over the world." 
Insights Success magazine focuses on leaders and orators from the world of technology, which includes CEOs, CIOs, VPs, managers and other professionals who have set a benchmark in the revolution of the IT industry. 
"Businesses need an integrated omni-channel customer service strategy so that they can connect with customers wherever they are to drive loyalty and increase sales," said Jonathan Gale, CEO of NewVoiceMedia. "Customers are your primary source of upsells, cross-sells, renewals, references, social media evangelism, support, market research, and product feedback. If you link your channels through a CRM solution like Salesforce and use your customers' data and relationship history, you can create a more meaningful conversation and faster resolution, so you can treat your customers the way they want to be treated. That is what NewVoiceMedia and ContactWorld is designed to support." 
For more information, visit www.insightssuccess.com or www.newvoicemedia.com . 
About NewVoiceMedia NewVoiceMedia powers customer connections that transform businesses globally. The leading vendor's award-winning cloud customer contact platform revolutionizes the way organizations connect with their customers worldwide, enabling them to deliver a personalized and unique customer service experience and drive a more effective sales and marketing team. With a true cloud environment and proven 99.999% platform availability, NewVoiceMedia ensures complete flexibility, scalability and reliability. 
Spanning 128 countries and six continents, NewVoiceMedia's 400+ customers include PhotoBox, MobileIron, TNT, Lumesse, Qlik, JustGiving, Canadian Cancer Society and Wowcher. For more information visit www.newvoicemedia.com or follow NewVoiceMedia on Twitter @NewVoiceMedia Contact:
